sen.j: 氷上大刀自（ひかみのおおとじ - 天武天皇11年（682年））は藤原鎌足の子。
sen.e: HIKAMI no Otoji (682) was a daughter of FUJIWARA no Kamatari.

sen.j: 天武天皇の夫人で、但馬皇女の母。
sen.e: Her husband was the Emperor Tenmu, and her daughter was Tajima no himemiko.

sen.e: The waka poem No. 4479 in book 20 of Manyoshu (Collection of Ten Thousand Leaves) is titled 'a waka poem by Fujiwara fujin,' and accompanied with a note stating that 'She is the wife of the Kiyomihara no miya Gyou Tenno (Emperor Tenmu), and her azana (Chinese courtesy name used in formal situations) is HIKAMI no Otoji.'
